mapper.sql: FROM (SELECT ps.pd_sale_tb_sales_price, od.orders_detail_tb_price, po.pd_order_tb_payment_date, ps.pd_sale_tb_received_price, od.orders_detail_tb_amount, po.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE FROM pd_order po JOIN orders_detail od on po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no JOIN pd_sale ps on od.pd_sale_tb_no = ps.pd_sale_tb_no) A WHERE A.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE >= #{startDate} AND A.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE <= (#{endDate}+1) AND NOT A.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE IS NULL AND A.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE in ('P', 'D', 'A')

(case when A.pd_sale_tb_sales_price < 10000 then '1만원미만' when A.pd_sale_tb_sales_price < 50000 then '5만원미만' when A.pd_sale_tb_sales_price < 100000 then '10만원미만' when A.pd_sale_tb_sales_price >= 100000 then '10만원이상' end)
mapper.select:
SELECT TO_CHAR(A.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'YY-MM') PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR, pd_sale_tb_sales_price_range, SUM(A.orders_detail_tb_price) orders_detail_tb_price_sum, SUM(A.pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price, SUM(A.orders_detail_tb_amount) orders_detail_tb_amount
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'YY-MM'),
ORDER BY ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM-dd') "PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR", pd_sale_tb_sales_price_range, SUM(A.orders_detail_tb_price) orders_detail_tb_price_sum, SUM(A.pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price, SUM(A.orders_detail_tb_amount) orders_detail_tb_amount
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM-dd'),
ORDER BY ASC

SELECT po.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY , SUM(po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT) PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_SUM, SUM(po.PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE) PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE, SUM(po.PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT) PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT, SUM(B.pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price FROM pd_order po, (SELECT sum(ps.pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price, A.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY FROM pd_sale ps, (select po.pd_order_tb_no, po.pd_order_tb_payment_date, od.pd_sale_tb_no, po.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY from pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no) A WHERE ps.pd_sale_tb_no = A.pd_sale_tb_no GROUP BY A.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY) B WHERE po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE >= #{startDate} AND po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE <= (#{endDate}+1) AND po.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE in ('P', 'D', 'A') AND po.pd_order_tb_ad_city = b.pd_order_tb_ad_city GROUP BY po.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY ORDER BY SUM(po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT) DESC

SELECT pc.product_category_tb_parent product_category_tb_parent, pc.product_category_tb_sub product_category_tb_sub, SUM(ct.orders_detail_tb_price) orders_detail_tb_price_sum, SUM(ct.pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price, SUM(ct.orders_detail_tb_amount) orders_detail_tb_amount FROM product_category pc, (SELECT po.pd_sale_tb_no, po.product_tb_code, po.pd_order_tb_payment_date, po.orders_detail_tb_price, pd.product_category_tb_no, po.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE, po.pd_sale_tb_received_price, po.orders_detail_tb_amount FROM product pd, (SELECT od.pd_sale_tb_no, ps.product_tb_code, od.orders_detail_tb_price, po.pd_order_tb_payment_date, po.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE, ps.pd_sale_tb_received_price, od.orders_detail_tb_amount FROM pd_order po, orders_detail od, pd_sale ps WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no AND od.pd_sale_tb_no = ps.pd_sale_tb_no AND NOT PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE IS NULL) po WHERE po.product_tb_code = pd.product_tb_code) ct WHERE pc.product_category_tb_no = ct.product_category_tb_no AND ct.pd_order_tb_payment_date >= #{startDate} AND ct.pd_order_tb_payment_date <= (#{endDate}+1) AND ct.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE in ('P', 'D', 'A') group by pc.product_category_tb_sub, pc.product_category_tb_parent ORDER BY pc.product_category_tb_sub ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'YY-MM') PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT) PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_SUM, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE) PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT) PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT, SUM(pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price
AND po.pd_order_tb_no = b.pd_order_tb_no GROUP BY TO_CHAR(po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'YY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'YY-MM') ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM-dd') PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT) PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_SUM, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE) PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT) PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT, SUM(pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price
AND po.pd_order_tb_no = b.pd_order_tb_no GROUP BY TO_CHAR(po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM-dd'), TO_CHAR(po.pd_order_tb_payment_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(po.pd_order_tb_payment_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ASC
mapper.sql: FROM pd_order po, (SELECT po.pd_order_tb_no, sum(ps.pd_sale_tb_received_price) pd_sale_tb_received_price, po.pd_order_tb_payment_date FROM pd_sale ps, (select po.pd_order_tb_no, po.pd_order_tb_payment_date, od.pd_sale_tb_no from pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no) po WHERE ps.pd_sale_tb_no = po.pd_sale_tb_no GROUP BY po.pd_order_tb_no, po.pd_order_tb_payment_date) B WHERE po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE >= #{startDate} AND po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE <= (#{endDate}+1) AND NOT po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE IS NULL AND pd_order_tb_state IN ('P', 'D', 'A')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pd_order WHERE customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo}

SELECT PD_ORDER_TB_NO , CUSTOMER_TB_NO , PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE , PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT , PD_ORDER_TB_STATE , PD_ORDER_TB_ADDRESS , PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY , PD_ORDER_TB_RECEIVER , PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE , PD_ORDER_TB_PHONE , PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE , PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT FROM pd_order WHERE pd_order_tb_no = #{pdOrderTbNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, pd_order_tb_no , customer_tb_no , pd_order_tb_order_date , pd_order_tb_payment , pd_order_tb_state , pd_order_tb_address , pd_order_tb_ad_city , pd_order_tb_receiver , pd_order_tb_payment_date , pd_order_tb_phone , pd_order_tb_delivery_fee , pd_order_tb_used_point, pd_sale_tb_product_name, order_product_count FROM ( SELECT po.PD_ORDER_TB_NO , po.CUSTOMER_TB_NO , po.PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT , po.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_ADDRESS , po.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY , po.PD_ORDER_TB_RECEIVER , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PHONE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT, odn.pd_sale_tb_product_name, odc.order_product_count FROM pd_order po, (SELECT pd_sale_tb_product_name FROM pd_sale WHERE pd_sale_tb_no = (SELECT MIN(od.pd_sale_tb_no) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY od.orders_detail_tb_no DESC) FROM pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no)) odn, (SELECT po.pd_order_tb_no, COUNT(*) order_product_count FROM pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no AND po.customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo} GROUP BY po.pd_order_tb_no) odc WHERE customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo} AND po.pd_order_tb_no = odc.pd_order_tb_no ORDER BY pd_order_tb_no DESC)) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow} AND rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pd_order VALUES( #{pdOrderTbNo}, #{customerTbNo}, SYSDATE, #{pdOrderTbPayment}, 'W', #{pdOrderTbAddress}, #{pdOrderTbAdCity}, #{pdOrderTbReceiver}, NULL, #{pdOrderTbPhone}, 2500, #{pdOrderTbUsedPoint} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PD_ORDER SET PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE=SYSDATE, PD_ORDER_TB_STATE='P' WHERE PD_ORDER_TB_NO=#{pdOrderTbNo}
mapper.select: SELECT Y.*, C.CUSTOMER_TB_NAME FROM( SELECT X.*, S.PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME FROM( SELECT O.PD_ORDER_TB_NO, O.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT, O.PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE, O.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE, O.CUSTOMER_TB_NO, D.PD_SALE_TB_NO, D.ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT FROM PD_ORDER O JOIN ( SELECT PD_ORDER_TB_NO, MIN(PD_SALE_TB_NO) "PD_SALE_TB_NO", COUNT(*) "ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT" FROM ORDERS_DETAIL GROUP BY PD_ORDER_TB_NO) D ON O.PD_ORDER_TB_NO = D.PD_ORDER_TB_NO WHERE PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{dayFrom} AND #{dayTo}) X JOIN PD_SALE S ON X.PD_SALE_TB_NO = S.PD_SALE_TB_NO) Y JOIN CUSTOMER C ON Y.CUSTOMER_TB_NO = C.CUSTOMER_TB_NO
SELECT PO.PD_ORDER_TB_NO, C.CUSTOMER_TB_NAME, PO.PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE, PO.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE FROM PD_ORDER PO JOIN CUSTOMER C ON PO.CUSTOMER_TB_NO = C.CUSTOMER_TB_NO
